prerequisite: Elemental origin or Born of the Elements feat
name: Reforged Soul
text: However you came by your elemental nature—by birth or through exposure to elemental magic—you are now an elemental creature. Exploring your heritage and testing its limits increases your personal power as well as your ability to command the magic flowing from the Elemental Chaos. The more you grow in power, the stronger the plane’s hold on you becomes.

features.chaos-touched(11thLevel): At the end of each extended rest, roll a d10 and consult the following table
features.surgingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an extra attack, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage if it is a close or area attack, or 1d10 extra damage if it is a melee or ranged attack
features.embracedByChaos(16thLevel): You roll twice and use both results when you use your Chaos-Touched feature
